resources.string: Readability is the app that enables the visually impaired to access and interact with printed documents in several easy-to-use ways.
Illustration of an phone capturing a text document
As easy as just pointing and shooting. Ð¢he build-in AI will convert your captured document to plain text. No difficult setup required.
Illustration of speech coming out of a headphone
Have the text read to you
After the conversion of the document to text, you can easily have it read-back to you in a voice of your choice. Later in this setup you will have the opportunity to configure this functionality.
A "Braille Reader" is a device that can convert the captured text to mechanical braille dots. Such a tool could be paired with Bluetooth.
So what are we waiting for? Let\'s configure the app so it can be used.
